issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

there's a very simple regression issue in video player.

simple test case:

var media_url = "http://phreadz.com/service/encoder.php?g=5LPOKP754&iph=1";
var activeMovie = Titanium.Media.createVideoPlayer({

                        url:media_url,
                        backgroundColor:'#111',
                        movieControlMode:Titanium.Media.VIDEO_CONTROL_DEFAULT,
                        scalingMode:Titanium.Media.VIDEO_SCALING_MODE_FILL
                    });

activeMovie.play();

{html}
fields.summary: iPhone: Regression problem in video player

comments.body:
{html}

(from [5670ac156dcf6acf0df5d98ef6f7bc5cc2cadde6]) [#965 state:resolved] fixed video player regression issue (iphone) http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/5670ac156dcf6...

{html}
